titleStmt.title: Testament Newydd ein harglwydd a'n hiachawdr Jesu Grist.
Bible. N.T. Welsh. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: gan Matthew Symmons yml y llew goreurog yn heol Aldersgat.

notesStmt.note: Ornament on title page consists of symbols of England, Scotland, France and Ireland.
Imperfect: p. 533-556 lacking, pages stained, cropped, and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
